title: Citibank España Launches "Todo Cuenta" (Everything Counts), The First Account That Grows With You
summary: Madrid – Citibank Spain has recently announced the launch of its new product, Todo Cuenta. This is a payroll account that introduces a series of day-to-day advantages for its clients that will help them save money while spending money.
tag-1: Citibank España Launches "Todo Cuenta" (Everything Counts), The First Account That Grows With You
tag-3: Madrid – Citibank Spain has recently announced the launch of its new product, Todo Cuenta. This is a payroll account that introduces a series of day-to-day advantages for its clients that will help them save money while spending money.
tag-4: Citibank's new Todo Cuenta is for new clients and existing customers who already have an account or investments with the bank. To be eligible for this offer, customers must either create a payroll account or an account in which they pay a pension or a deposit that amounts to 2,000 Euros per month.
tag-6: Monthly reimbursement Todo Cuenta reimburses 3 percent of the main bills, as well as 1 percent of all the shopping carried out with the debit card, up to 100 Euros a month. This is a unique offer within the Spanish market. Furthermore, the reimbursement has no time restriction and is paid monthly. Electricity, gas, water, fixed telephone lines, mobile and internet bills are all included.
tag-7: Free withdrawals With Citibank's debit card, you can withdraw money without paying commissions from any ATM, any network or any bank in Spain and around the world.
tag-8: No commissions Todo Cuenta does not charge commissions during the maintenance of the account, nor for any annual quotas on debit and credit cards, nor for national/transnational Euro transfers through the internet.
tag-9: Todo Cuenta can be arranged in any of the Citibank España offices around Spain. Offices will also offer to manage any changes from other existing accounts to this new one so that customers can benefit from the repayment of up to 1,200 Euros a year.
tag-10: "We are offering our clients one of the best accounts on the market and on a permanent basis. Our payroll account is not a promotion and has the same conditions and advantages for our existing clients as for our new clients. We would like to treat our clients as if they were new ones every day," explained José Pons, Director of Products in Citibank Spain.
tag-11: Citi Citi, the leading global financial services company, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management. Additional information may be found at www.citigroup.com.
